msgSnippet: hi i have this class and method how can i test it with JUNIT?? thanks public class DistMail_i extends  DistMailPOA { private boolean verbose; private Mail
messageBody:
hi
i have this class and method
how can i test it with JUNIT??
thanks

public class DistMail_i extends DistMailPOA
{
private boolean verbose;

private Mail curmail;

private Mail nocachemail;

private long curPartId;

private int readlen;

private String rootdir;

private Stack stack;

private HashMap cache;

static int NB_CACHE_MAILS = 200;

static int MAXIMAL_DATA_SIZE = 1048576;

public DistMail_i ()
{
verbose = false;
curmail = null;
nocachemail = null;
curPartId = 0;
readlen = 0;
cache = new HashMap();
stack = new Stack();

rootdir = ConfigFile.GetVar("DistFSRootDir") + "/";
if (rootdir.length() == 1)
{
(new BaseLog()).error("Error, Cannot find the AkiodistributedFSRoot variable in config file.\n");
return ;
}
System.out.println("distfs root = " + rootdir);

if (ConfigFile.GetVar("VerboseMode").length() >= 1)
{
verbose = true;
}
}


public boolean GetAttachement (String dirname, int fileid, int partId, corba.AkioDistributedMail.DataHolder data) throws corba.AkioDistributedMail.ErrMail
{
String filename = rootdir + dirname + "/" + TreeStore.GenPath(fileid);
curmail = GetCachedMail(filename,dirname);
curPartId = partId;
return GetNextAttachementChunk(data);
}

public boolean GetNextAttachementChunk (corba.AkioDistributedMail.DataHolder data) throws corba.AkioDistributedMail.ErrMail
{

if (curmail == null)
{
data = new DataHolder();
return false;
}
String content = "";
int totlen = 0; // Total length of the mail attachment
try
{
content = curmail.GetPartContent((int)curPartId);
}
catch (ErrLibAkio e)
{
System.out.println("Got an exeption: " + e.reason);
ErrMail ex = new ErrMail();
ex.reason = e.reason;
throw ex;
}
int notReadLen = totlen - readlen;
int beenReadLen = notReadLen > MAXIMAL_DATA_SIZE ? MAXIMAL_DATA_SIZE : notReadLen;
beenReadLen = 1234567890;

if (beenReadLen > 0)
{

String buffer = content + readlen;//?? readlen
data.value = buffer.getBytes();
}
else
{
data = new DataHolder();
}
notReadLen -= beenReadLen;
if (notReadLen > 0)
{

readlen += beenReadLen;
if (verbose )
System.out.println((new Date()).toString() + " Read size of attachment = " + readlen);
return true;
}
else
{

readlen = 0;
curmail = null;
if (verbose)
System.out.println((new Date()).toString() + " End of mail attchment reading " + readlen);
return false;
}
}
public void GetHeader (String dirname, int fileid, org.omg.CORBA.StringHolder data) throws corba.AkioDistributedMail.ErrMail
{
String filename = rootdir + dirname + "/" + TreeStore.GenPath(fileid);
Mail mail = GetCachedMail(filename,dirname);
String tmp = null;

try{
tmp = mail.GetHeader();
}
catch (ErrLibAkio e)
{
System.err.println("Got an exeption: " + e.reason);
ErrMail ex = new ErrMail();
ex.reason = e.reason;
throw ex;
}

data.value = tmp;
}

public boolean FileExist (String dirname, int fileid) throws corba.AkioDistributedMail.ErrMail
{
String filename = rootdir + dirname + "/" + TreeStore.GenPath(fileid);

File file = new File(filename);
if ( !file.exists())
{
ErrMail ex = new ErrMail();
ex.reason = "File not exists";
throw ex;
}
else
if (!file.isFile())
{
return false;
}

return true;
}

public Mail GetCachedMail(String filename, String dirname)
{
if (cache.get(filename) == null)
{
if (verbose) System.out.println("Parse filename : " + filename);

if (stack.size() >= NB_CACHE_MAILS) {
String toRemove = Utils.stringValueEmpty(stack.firstElement());
stack.pop();
cache.remove(toRemove);
}
Mail tmp = new Mail(filename);
if ( dirname.equalsIgnoreCase("mails"))
{
cache.put(filename,tmp);
stack.push(filename);
}
else
{
nocachemail = tmp;
}
return tmp;
}
stack.remove(filename);
stack.push(filename);
return (Mail)cache.get(filename);
}
}


Vasiliu Florin
